00041     void ScoringModel::read(std::istream & input)
00042       {
00043         if (!input)
00044           {
00045             throw bpp::IOException ("ScoringModel::ScoringModel: fail to open file");
00046           }
00047 
00048         string temp;
00049         string type;
00050 
00051         double gapStart;
00052         double gapExtend;
00053         uint Size = 1;
00054 
00055         // Main loop : for all file lines
00056         while (!input.eof())
00057           {
00058             getline(input, temp, '\n'); // Copy current line in temporary string
00059 
00060             if (temp[0] != '#')
00061               {
00062                 istringstream istring(temp);
00063                 istring >> type >> gapStart >> gapExtend;
00064                 istring >> temp; //Cut out the ":" char
00065 
00066                 while (istring)
00067                   {
00068                     AlignmentSymbol sc;
00069                     istring >> temp;
00070                     if (!temp.empty())
00071                       {
00072                         sc.symbol = bpp::TextTools::toUpper(temp);
00073                         if (sc.symbol.length() > Size)
00074                           Size = sc.symbol.length();
00075                         sc.type = type;
00076                         //Changed gapOpen & gapExtend to negative Values to correspond with Maximize
00077                         sc.gapOpen = -gapStart;
00078                         sc.gapExtend = -gapExtend;
00079                         model[sc.symbol] = sc;
00080                         //Also add negative Symbol Version
00081                         sc.symbol = "-" + sc.symbol;
00082                         model[sc.symbol] = sc;
00083                       }
00084                   }
00085 
00086               }
00087           }
00088       }
00089 
00090     void ScoringModel::read(const std::string &path)
00091       {
00092         ifstream input(path.c_str(), ios::in);
00093         read(input);
00094         input.close();
00095       }
00096 
00097     double ScoringModel::ScoreOf(const std::string &A, const std::string &B) const
00098       {
00099         //Check if two symbols are completly identical
00100         if (A.compare(B) == 0)
00101           return 20;
00102         else
00103           return -10;
00104       }
00105 
00106     double ScoringModel::ScoreOfGapOpen(const std::string A) const
00107       {
00108         ModelValues::const_iterator foo = model.find(A);
00109         return foo->second.gapOpen;
00110       }
00111     double ScoringModel::ScoreOfGapExtend(const std::string A) const
00112       {
00113         ModelValues::const_iterator foo = model.find(A);
00114         return foo->second.gapExtend;
00115       }
00116     int ScoringModel::GetModelSize(void) const
00117       {
00118         return model.size();
00119       }
00120 
00121     const double &ScoringModel::BestOfTwo(const double &A, const double &B) const
00122       {
00123         //If we minimize
00124         //return std::min(A, B);
00125         //If we maximize
00126         return std::max(A, B);
00127       }
00128 
00129     const double &ScoringModel::BestOfThree(double &A, double &B, double &C) const
00130       {
00131 
00132         return BestOfTwo(A, BestOfTwo(B, C) );
00133 
00134       }
00135     ModelValues::const_iterator ScoringModel::itBegin(void) const
00136       {
00137         return model.begin();
00138       }
00139     ModelValues::const_iterator ScoringModel::itEnd(void) const
00140       {
00141         return model.end();
